aspecttable.name: CSX-1998
aspecttable.reference: As described in the January 1998 version of the CSX Transportation publication "Signal Rules - 281-298".

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal not exceeding Limited Speed.

aspect.name: Limited Clear
aspect.indication: Limited Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed

aspect.name: Limited Approach
aspect.indication: Limited Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed, prepared to stop at next signal.

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching next signal not exceeding Medium Speed.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at second signal.

aspect.name: Medium Clear
aspect.indication: Medium Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Medium Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed, approaching next signal not exceeding Medium Speed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Medium Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed, approaching next signal not exceeding Slow Speed.

aspect.name: Medium Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Medium Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches; then proceed, preparing to stop at second signal.

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching next signal not exceeding slow speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Train exceeding medium speed must immediately begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the engine passes the Approach Signal.

aspect.name: Medium Approach
aspect.indication: Medium Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches, then proceed, prepared to stop at next signal.

aspect.name: Slow Clear
aspect.indication: Slow Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches, then proceed.

aspect.name: Slow Approach
aspect.indication: Slow Speed through turnouts, crossovers, sidings and over power-operated switches, then proceed, prepared to stop at next signal.
